So with billions of products

have quite an enormous
responsibility to ensure that.

And to be able to do that,
we have to monitor layers
of activity on Amazon.

That includes seller activity,
listing activities, as well

And gen AI is really enabling
us to scale more quickly
and accurately to identify these issues

and ensure that imperfect
products aren't being removed

before they're being shipped
out to our customers.

So one key area where
we're using Gen AI is

to identify defects on the
physical product within our

fulfillment center before it
gets shipped to our customers.

At our fulfillment
centers, there are a number
of imaging tunnels
and products are passing

And what we've essentially
done is developed a fine
to envision language model as well

model to scan these items

for defects based on the images
captured from these tunnels.

So after identifying an

It could be anywhere from the seller
